cells.text: In conclusion, we have demonstrated the nonlinear
cells.text_vi: Tóm lại, chúng tôi đã chứng minh phi tuyến

cells.text: Faraday rotation for a sample of cold atoms both with

cells.text: beam alleviated the problem of mechanical perturbation
